title: Secret beyond the door
brief_description: In this example of forties Gothic a woman comes to fear the man to whom she is attached. Here Bennett’s husband is an architect who obsessively collects ‘felicitous rooms’ in which women have been murdered, and she realizes that she must uncover the secret of one room that is always kept locked. Lang brings a precise expressionism to bear on this baroque popularization of Freudian psychoanalysis, creating an atmosphere in which the subconscious seems suspended as in a dream or a nightmare. Cast includes Joan Bennett, Michael Redgrave and Anne Revere. Based on the story by Rufus King.
